title: New: AURORA – Runaway
body:
Part of what I love about eighteen year old Norwegian singer **AURORA** is the real sense of personality that feels embedded in her music.

Not just through her stunning, unique vocal, but through her devastating lyrics and grasp of melody; she’s easily one of the most exciting young singers around at this moment in time. Following up on her two tracks from last year, _Runaway_ may be her most complete track yet, and feels like a mightily important step forward in her fledgling career. Check it out below, and catch a free show at The Courtyard Theatre in London on 24 February, as well as dates as Great Escape Festival in May.

Not just through her stunning, unique vocal, but through her devastating lyrics and grasp of melody; she’s easily one of the most exciting young singers around at this moment in time. \[…\]
